Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , for those who relapse , high - dose chemotherapy with autologous stem cell transplant is the treatment of choice which relies on adequate disease control with salvage chemotherapy .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| high-dose chemotherapy |
| autologous stem cells |
| salvage chemotherapy |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| high-dose chemotherapy |
| salvage chemotherapy |

Note: Autologous stem cells are not a chemical substance, but rather a type of biological material. However, high-dose chemotherapy and salvage chemotherapy are chemical treatments.
